column5: Stay in this studio loft in the heart of Historic Downtown Bryan! You will be within walking distance of the restaurants, bars, brew-pubs, shops, and music venues of downtown, and only five miles from Texas A&M campus. Enjoy the great location, high ceilings, and exposed brick. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and big groups. In addition to the queen sized bed, the couch pulls out to comfortably sleep two more adults. There is also plenty of floor space!
column8: Studio Loft in Historic Downtown Bryan
